body.name: INSE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 6-in-1 Lightweight Stick Vacuum Up to 45min Runtime, Vacuum Cleaner with 2200mAh Rechargeable Battery, Powerful Cordless Stick Vacuum for Hardwood Floor Pet Hair Car-Navy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 7 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 22 mins
features: 【Effortlessly Clean Every Corner】The cordless vacuum cleaner is perfect for hard floors, short-pile carpets, stairs, cars, windowsills, pets, sofas, drawers, beds, cabinets, desks, bookshelves, kitchens, curtains, etc. The upgraded high-speed motor built into the cordless stick vacuum can provide powerful suction in MAX mode. A lightweight cordless vacuum with a 6-in-1 design makes it convenient and easy to use, making cleaning less of a chore and more of a pleasure！

【45 Minutes Long-lasting Runtime】The rechargeable cordless vacuum cleaner provides a fade-free cleaning performance for up to 45mins, meanwhile providing a 5 times longer service life with over voltage, over current, overheat, and short circuit protection. The detachable battery can be charged singly or on its main body. A battery stick vacuum cleaner with powerful suction and long-lasting runtime engineered for whole-home, deep cleaning!

【5-Layer High-Efficiency Filtration System】INSE cordless vacuum cleaner is equipped with fully sealed high-efficiency cyclone separation technology and a high-density filtration system that captures up to 99.99% of microscopic dust particles as small as 0.1 microns without leakage while expelling purified fresher air for your family. The lightweight cordless stick vacuum cleaner picks up pet hair, fine dust, debris, dirt, cereal, food residue, and large particles and delivers perfect floor-cleaning performance.

【Multifunction & Lightweight】Battery cordless stick vacuum equipped with retractable tube and versatile attachments, allowing you to clean the dust on the curtains or ceiling, and can be switched into a handheld cordless vacuum to pick up debris on the table or in the gap between the car's seats; you can also attach the cleaner head to the main motor to clean the stairs with ease. Rechargeable stick vacuum only weighing 3lb. Meet all your daily cleaning needs!

【Flexible LED Motorized Brush Head】The rechargeable hardwood floor stick vacuum is cordless with LED headlights to illuminate the dust, debris, and hair under furniture or other hard-to-reach dark corner and track it. Maneuverable 180° swivels sideways and 90°up and down to let you clean the dust under furniture and bed(over 2 inches). Relax your wrist and arm with an ergonomic handle. Bring you the best cleaning performance and efficiency!

【Easy to Empty & Storage】This stick cordless vacuum cleaner offers effortless maintenance of a clean and organized living space. Thanks to its generously large dust cup, which can be emptied with a simple button press, there is no need to touch any dust or debris. Furthermore, the battery vacuum is equipped with a wall-hanging storage option and an attachments storage rack that can be easily attached to the tube, providing convenient storage and accessibility. The filter of the vacuum cleaner cordless is detachable, washable, and recyclable.

【Satisfactory Customer Service】When you purchase a product from our store, you can expect to have access to 24/7 online customer support. Additionally, our rechargeable cordless stick vacuum cleaners come with a 12-month after-sales service that guarantees 100% satisfaction. At INSE, our top priority is delivering exceptional customer service and high-quality products. Remember to clean the filter/sponge regularly to maintain the vacuum's powerful suction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific Vacuum for hardwood floors
reviews.reviewText: Our house has hardwood floors and some low pile carpets. We have a short hair dog and living by the shore we deal with sand. The INSE is terrific. We can easily vacuum our house daily and it does a great job picking up hair, crumbs, sand and dirt, largely because of the POWERED head. The attachments are perfect for baseboards and window tracks. It typically takes us about 20 minutes to vacuum our whole house and we've had no issues on battery life, even on the "turbo" setting. It does take a few hours to charge a depleted battery, so be aware. I've accidentally dropped the unit a few times and it survived without issue. It has proven to be really durable. It is very easy to clean - PROVIDED you only vacuum up dry messes. Anything with moisture causes a problem and you have to disassemble the unit to clean it properly. This isn't a replacement for a regular corded vacuum if you need lots of suction (the "economy mode" is worthless - only the Turbo mode is useful), and it probably won't work well if you have a lot of pile carpeting or pile rugs. For example, it doesn't work well on our patterned doormat. For hard surfaces in turbo mode - it is surprisingly good for the price and with its light weight and easy to clean design, it's a great everyday picker-upper.Nov 2023 update:We use this vacuum every day and for us it works super well. We have hard surfaces and it has performed really well. One suggestion - take the advice of the instructions and clean the filter regularly. Any comments about loss of suction I've seen I would imagine is related to not doing this. Let me say, it is out of the warranty period and, again, we use it at least every day - and often much more. Recently, we had the connector hose break in the power head and I reached out to INSE support expecting to have to pay for a new part or, more likely, have to re-buy the vacuum. Boy was I wrong! I got a response within 24 hours and they asked for some pictures and my order number from Amazon. I sent along the information and within a day a new power head was shipped to me - no argument, no run-around, no hassle. I only wish other sellers on AMZ had the same focus on customer service. Sure you can build a great product, but standing behind your product is priceless in today's world. This has been the best ~$100 I've spent on something in a long time. Bravo INSE, Bravo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Update : warranty honored. Stopped working on the 5th month!
reviews.reviewText: Warranty honored! I contacted the seller who gave me my warranty info which I forwarded to support@inselife.com The service was quick, the process took a few weeks with us first receiving a new charger and then receiving a replacement battery which did the trick. The warranty is for 2 years from the date you receive it from Amazon. I’m please to have in back in service. I only gave 4 stars back, because I believe they did know there was a battery issue and it would have been nice if the issued a recall. I noted the email address for warranty or customer service. support@inselife.comUpdate 7/21: Originally we loved this unit, for quick pick-ups. but it stopped working after 5 months, Not worth the price we paid. We were very careful with in, hung it after every use, kept it clean and charged the battery when low. I don't recommend buying it now. will update again if they make good on the warranty.Perfect for my needs. Easy to assemble, easy to use and store whether you are hanging on the supplied hook or disassembling to store in a small space. Well thought out design. There is not enough information on the dust bin. It comes completely apart with TWO washable filter. I’ll wash mine after each use. Because the inside filter does it’s job and picks up the finest particles. It did such a good job, I couldn’t see the photo of a faucet (symbol for washing) under all the dust.I live on the beach (sand!) have laminate wood with low pile area rugs and it’s does pick up lots German Shepherd dog hair off a the low pike rug. Picks up flour off the floor. It excels on hardwood, tile and laminate floor. Great for stairs. The brush tools DO SNAP DIRECTLY to the power vac motor to make cleaning easier.Now I’ll talk about cat litter - perfect job picking up litter on hard floor and a low pile rug with both the power head or the tools.So many options with this unit. I paid $130. But a day later there was a coupon for an additional $18 off.My only suggestion is to be sure to hang it or lay it down when not in use so it doesn’t fall. It’s too heavy of course.If you are looking for deep cleaning a pile rug, this is not going to be your go to vacuum. It sure does a great job otherwise. I think you will be pleased not hauling a cord around makes keeping a clean house with a dog, cat, kids, and adults easy.Add it to your cart, I don’t think you will find better fir the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far. So good..
reviews.reviewText: I have a German shepherd. That pretty much says it all. The dust cup is small and so I have to empty frequently but it is so quick and easy that is not a problem. The system choked when I overfilled it with dog fur. Easy to assemble. Light and highly maneuverable. My only problem came when I tried and tried and TRIED to get the dust collection unit back together and I was so frustrated I actually looked at the directions. Genius! Problem solved! This is still brand new so durability is not known yet.I really like this vacuum but sadly it is not suited to my home. My apartment is about 1400 sq ft. And is all hardwood floors but my heavy-coated German shepherds fur plugs the vacuum very quickly and I have to take it apart to release the blockage. It would function very nicely in a home with shorthaired pets . I like how it handles with a very nimble head, good, suction and light weight ease. It can easily vacuum under low furniture. So this is not working for me but could be. a very nice addition for an apartment or maybe an vupstairs vacuum cleaner.
